verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
He that is in us is greater
Than he that is in the world
He that is in us is greater
Than he that is in the world

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Therefore I will sing
And I will rejoice
For His Spirit lives in me
Christ the Living One has overcome
And we share in His victory

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
All the powers of death and hell and sin
Lie crushed beneath His feet
Jesus owns the Name above all names
Crowned with honour and majesty

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He that is in us is greater
Than he that is in the world
He that is in us is greater
Than he that is in the world
